title: Shredded sprouts with bacon and chestnuts
description: This dish is super quick to finish at the last minute and it's nothing like the water-logged versions that have given sprouts such a bad name. It's still lovely without the breadcrumbs but they do add a pleasing crunch.
ingredients: 200g/7oz bacon lardons, or sliced streaky bacon
500g/1lb 2oz fresh Brussels sprouts, shredded in a food processor
salt and freshly ground black pepper
large knob of butter or 2 tbsp olive oil
